original_title: National Eye Hospital Doctors on strike
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Government Medical Officers' Association said doctors at the National Eye Hospital in Colombo are prepared to launch a token strike on Thursday (14).
GMOA Spokesperson Dr. Chamil Wijesinghe said the doctors will launch the token strike from 8am to 4pm on Thursday (14).

He said the token strike is being launched over the failure of the Hospital Director and the Ministry of Health to respond to the unprofessional behavior of the Administrative Officer of the Hospital.
However, emergency services will continue to operate despite the token strike.
